channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Racks 31A19/31A20/31A21 maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 16, 21:00 UTC  -  Dec 17, 06:00 UTC

Nov 5, 13:13 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer.

Start time : 16/12/2025 21:00 UTC
End time : 17/12/2025 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Servers in the specified racks will be temporarily unavailable up to 9 hours during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be moving servers in the specified racks from RBX2 to RBX7.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - Room GRA0327A
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 10, 06:00 - 11:00 UTC

Oct 30, 14:24 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

Start time : 10/12/2025 06:00 UTC
End time : 10/12/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may experience up to 5 hours of service unavailability affecting the racks listed below :
GRA0327A05B
GRA0327A07B
GRA0327A07C

During the maintenance window, access to the IPMI (Intelligent Platform Management Interface) will be temporarily unavailable for the racks listed below :
GRA0327A05A
GRA0327A06A
GRA0327A06B
GRA0327A06C
GRA0327A07A
GRA0327A05B
GRA0327A07B
GRA0327A07C

Please note that the maintenance may take less time than expected.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment on the specified racks.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [BHS8][Dedicated Servers] - Rack BHS0807B03C/BHS0807B03B/BHS0807A04A/BHS0807A03C/BHS0807A03B maintenance notification.
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 3, 06:00 - 11:00 UTC

Oct 29, 05:32 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

Start time : 03/12/2025 06:00 UTC
End time : 03/12/2025 11:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance servers located in racks BHS0807B03C, BHS0807B03B, BHS0807A04A, BHS0807A03C and BHS0807A03B will experience a loss of network connectivity for 1 hour.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipments on the specified racks.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA4][Dedicated Servers] - Rack GRA0406C02B maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 2, 03:00 - 04:00 UTC

Nov 7, 11:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, we will be carrying out a maintenance on our network equipment in the rack GRA0406C02B.

Start time : 02/12/2025 03:00 UTC
End time : 02/12/2025 04:00 UTC
Service impact : During the maintenance window, customers with LACP enabled will experience temporary bandwidth perturbation on their public and private networks.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be carrying out maintenance on our network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [SGP1][Dedicated Servers] - Room SGP1 maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 27, 12:00 - 18:00 UTC

Nov 10, 10:15 UTC
Update - This maintenance has been re-scheduled.
Below you can find new information about the operation.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer in the room SGP1.

This may temporarily affect availability.
Start time: 27/11/2025 12:00 UTC
End time: 27/11/2025 18:00 UTC
Service impact: During the maintenance window, some servers in room SGP1 will be temporarily unavailable.
Please note that impacted customers will be notified through a ticket.
Service improvement: As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will migrate servers in the room SGP1 to SGP2.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [US-WEST-LZ-PAO][Virtual Private Servers] - Some actions temporarily unavailable
item.description:
Nov 12, 16:53 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Virtual Private Servers offer on the specific region.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 12/11/2025 14:48 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Actions like creation, update, deletion on Virtual Private Servers instances are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to make actions like creation, update, deletion on their Virtual Private Servers instances.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a network equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
